dropdown_items.title: Alert Dialog
dropdown_items.description: A modal dialog that interrupts the user with important content and expects a response.

dropdown_items.title: Hover Card
dropdown_items.description: For sighted users to preview content available behind a link.

dropdown_items.title: Progress
dropdown_items.description: Displays an indicator showing the completion progress of a task, typically displayed as a progress bar.
